entry.title: Just FYI
entry.summary: In this message, Venzen asks for clarification on publishing keys after they have been signed. Specifically, he asks if the key needs to be published again after it has been signed and if the key used to sign it needs to be published for signature verification. He addresses Peter Todd, who previously gave gpg advice about publishing keys. Venzen's questions are not specific to the GNU Privacy Guard (GnuPG), but he notes that his request would benefit those on the GnuPG support list. The message includes a PGP signature, indicating the authenticity of the message.
